title: Somewhere I saw that in 1892 Bald Head Island was purchased and was to be named Pullman Island in honor of George Pullman, the railcar king.  If true, whatever became of that deal?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2017/05/was-bald-head-island-to-be-named-in-honor-of-george-pullman-the-railcar-king/
